Description: This wine is a true celebration of Beaujolais. Powerful black fruits are accompanied by dense tannins that still need time to soften. This wine is impressively rich, softened by some wood aging. It will mature well, so drink from 2025.                      Roger Voss
Name: Château des Jacques 2020 Le Moulin  (Moulin-à-Vent)Cellar Selection

Description: A firm and textured wine, this has ripe black fruits over solid tannins. The wine is rich and concentrated, to be expected from old bush vines. It will age well, so wait to drink until 2025.                      Roger Voss
Name: Laurent Perrachon et Fils 2021 Les Vignes Centenaires  (Juliénas)

Description: The potential of this solid, dense wine is enormous. With rich black fruits and dense concentration, it has a fine future. Drink from 2025.                      Roger Voss
Name: Château des Jacques 2020 Clos de Rochegrès  (Moulin-à-Vent)Cellar Selection

Description: One of the single-vineyard wines from this producer, this bottling has power and density. Its richness is without question, needing time to soften. It is likely to be ready from 2025.                      Roger Voss
Name: Château des Jacques 2020 Clos du Grand Carquelin  (Moulin-à-Vent)

Description: This wine is full, ripe and structured, with tannins still playing an important part. It is dense and powerful, with layers of black fruits and texture. Drink from 2025.                      Roger Voss
Name: Château des Jacques 2020 Clos des Thorins  (Moulin-à-Vent)

Description: Owned by Beaune producer Louis Jadot, this estate produces some fine wines. Ripe black fruits and layers of tannins show that this is still developing into a ripe, floral wine. The wine is full, packed with fruit and structure. Drink from 2024.                      Roger Voss
Name: Château des Jacques 2020  Fleurie
